languages.text: {n}Инфернусы выглядят обескураженными, но под изумленными гримасами уже проступает праведное возмущение. Огромные, покрытые ожогами кулаки сжимаются, превращаясь в орудия убийства.{/n}
{n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернусы выглядят обескураженными, но под изумленными гримасами уже проступает праведное возмущение. Огромные, покрытые ожогами кулаки сжимаются, превращаясь в орудия убийства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Inferni look baffled, but the astonishment is giving way to righteous indignation. Huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
{n}The Inferni look baffled, but the astonishment is giving way to righteous indignation. Huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
{n}The Inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists to clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
{n}The Inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists to clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
{n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
{n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los infernus se muestran atónitos, pero su sorpresa no tarda en abrir paso a una fiera indignación y sus enormes puños cubiertos de quemaduras se cierran para formar herramientas mortales.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los infernus se muestran atónitos, pero su sorpresa no tarda en abrir paso a una fiera indignación y sus enormes puños cubiertos de quemaduras se cierran para formar herramientas mortales.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌスたちは困惑の表情を浮かべるが、握りしめられた燃える巨大な拳が殺人の道具になると、その驚きは当然、すぐに憤怒へと変わった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌスたちは困惑の表情を浮かべるが、握りしめられた燃える巨大な拳が殺人の道具になると、その驚きは当然、すぐに憤怒へと変わった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有人看起来都非常困惑，但没过多久，他们的震惊就变成了正义的愤慨，满是烧伤的硕大拳头攥紧了手里的杀人工具。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人看起来都非常困惑，但没过多久，他们的震惊就变成了正义的愤慨，满是烧伤的硕大拳头攥紧了手里的杀人工具。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Inferni sehen völlig verblüfft aus, doch die Überraschung weicht bald rechtschaffener Entrüstung, als riesige Fäuste voller Brandwunden sich zu Mordwerkzeugen zusammenballen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Inferni sehen völlig verblüfft aus, doch die Überraschung weicht bald rechtschaffener Entrüstung, als riesige Fäuste voller Brandwunden sich zu Mordwerkzeugen zusammenballen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'abord déconcertés, les inferni laissent très vite éclater leur indignation et serrent leurs poings couverts de brûlures qui, le cas échéant, pourraient très bien devenir des instruments de mort.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'abord déconcertés, les inferni laissent très vite éclater leur indignation et serrent leurs poings couverts de brûlures qui, le cas échéant, pourraient très bien devenir des instruments de mort.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İtfacılar şaşkın görünüyor. Fakat hayretleri yerini çabucak haklı öfkeye bırakırken devasa ve yanık yumrukları sıkılıp cinayet silahlarını andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The inferni look baffled, but the astonishment soon gives way to righteous indignation as huge, burn-covered fists clench into instruments of murder.{/n}
